member.name: T:BookPubDB.Model.Author
member.summary: Represents an author who writes books.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Author.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the author.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Author.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the first name of the author.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Author.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name of the author.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Author.Books
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of books written by the author.
